name: Oskar Thorén
bio: Oskar Thorén is an independent researcher, writing and researching about Zero Knowledge Proofs. Recently he has been writing about ZKPs at ZKIntro.com, exploring a Nova-based-ZK VM, HyperNova, and trying to make proving on mobile easier. Previously he founded and was Director of Research at Vac.dev, an R&D org building public good protocols for the decentralized web, with a focus on privacy and communication. Website: https://oskarth.com Twitter: https://twitter.com/oskarth
